== Haldipur (603736) ==
      
Haldipur is a village in the [[Honavar ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 1443.05 hectares and harbouring 2308 households with total population of 10421 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[HONAVAR]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 5173 and female population is 5248. Scheduled Caste Population is 1114 and Scheduled Tribes population is 82. Census Location Code of the village is 603736<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
